entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind south 20 km/h except gusting to 40 near lake Winnipeg overnight. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h except gusting to 40 near lake Winnipeg in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 in the afternoon. entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h except gusting to 40 near lake Winnipeg in the evening. Wind becoming light near midnight.
